info.description:
[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/OS-Unix-blue.svg?longCache=True)]() [![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/mac-brave.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/mac-brave/) [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/) ### Installation ```bash $ [sudo] pip install mac-brave ``` ```bash $ [sudo] npm i -g mac-brave ``` #### Config ```bash $ export BRAVE_TIMEOUT=10 # 5 by default ``` #### Examples url(s) ```bash $ brave urls https://github.com/ https://google.com/ $ brave url https://github.com/ ``` open/refresh ```bash $ brave open "https://github.com/" "https://google.com/" $ brave refresh "https://github.com/" ``` fullscreen ```bash $ brave fullscreen-enter $ brave fullscreen-detect 1 $ brave fullscreen-exit ``` frontmost (`1` or `0`) ```bash $ brave frontmost 0 ``` `Brave Browser.app` process ```bash $ brave pid 42 $ brave isready 5 # timeout 5 seconds 1 $ brave kill ```

readme42.com
info.name: mac-brave
